post:
Thank you LET! HostMyBytes has really come a long way since our last offer. We're now hosting over 1,000 customers. We're absolutely thrilled and entirely thankful for our customers from LowEndTalk. 

To show our gratitude, we're giving some great deals on our VPS services. If you're thinking about waiting, be careful, since we have limited stock on this promotion! 

_This offer expires whenever our stock reaches zero on these plans_

**LET RAM**
> 2048 MB RAM

> 1 IPv4 Address

> 50 GB Disk Space

> 2 TB Bandwidth

> IPv6 Support

$4.95/mo

$40.00/yr - breaks down to $3.33/mo

[ORDER HERE](https://clients.hostmybytes.com/cart.php?gid=27)

**LET Storage**
> 1024 MB RAM

> 1 IPv4 Address

> 500 GB Disk Space

> 3 TB Bandwidth

> IPv6 Support


$7/mo

[ORDER HERE](https://clients.hostmybytes.com/cart.php?gid=27)

**Looking for FREE Account Credit?**

[Follow @HostMyBytes on Twitter ](http://twitter.com/hostmybytes)for a free $1.50 account credit or a free month of shared hosting on a new hosting account. Then just send in a ticket letting us know your Twitter username. Limit of 1 per billing account.

**We're Not Usually A Low End Provider**
> "Just signed up for a new 4GB VPS. Activation was quick. Opened tickets for cpanel and centos to be installed. Staff are very friendly!"
-Ben Conway

> "One of the best hosts out there. Quick and helpful support. Cheap but reliable hosting. "
-Joshua Brown

> "Been a very great support whenever needed, had packet loss opened a live chat and was fixed almost immediately!"
-Sam Gorton

Read what our clients think: http://clients.hostmybytes.com/index.php?m=whmcs_reviews
